com.vdisk.android

类 ComplexUploadHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vdisk.net.ProgressListener
      • com.vdisk.android.ComplexUploadHandler

  • public abstract class ComplexUploadHandler
extends ProgressListener
    此类在整个上传回话中起到了控制协调的作用。通过此类，可以实时得到当前大文件上传的状态，可以实时得到当前文件的上传进度， 可以中断上传行为。 通过此类，可以读取，更新，删除本地数据库的分段信息 This class plays a coordinating control role in the whole upload session. This class is used to get current status and progress in real time when upload a big file, or stop the uploading. This class is used to read, update and delete segment information in local database.
    作者:
    Kevin

    • 方法详细资料

      • onProgress

        public void onProgress(long bytes,
              long total)
        此回调方法可以得到当前文件的上传进度 Callback to get upload progress of current file.
        指定者:
        onProgress 在类中 ProgressListener
        参数:
        bytes - 整个上传会话中，已经上传的总字节数 Total number of bytes uploaded in the whole upload session
        total - 当前分段的总长度 Total size of current segment

      • startedWithStatus

        public abstract void startedWithStatus(ComplexUploadHandler.ComplexUploadStatus status)
        回调方法，实时更新当前上传状态 Callback to update current upload status in real time.
        参数:
        status -

      • finishedWithMetadata

        public abstract void finishedWithMetadata(VDiskAPI.Entry metadata)
        回调方法，表示文件已经上传结束。 普通上传结束和秒传成功都会回调此方法 Callback to show the file has been uploaded over. The success of common or blitz upload will callback this method.
        参数:
        metadata - 上传成功后的文件信息 uploaded file information

      • readUploadFileInfo

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo readUploadFileInfo(String srcPath,
                                              String desPath)
                                                throws VDiskException
        从数据库中读取文件分段信息。 通过重写此方法，可以自定义本地文件分段信息的存储方式。 Read file segment information in database. Override this method to user-define a storage mode for segment information.
        参数:
        srcPath - 本地文件路径 Source path of local file
        desPath - 微盘目标路径 Target path of file in VDisk
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • updateUploadFileInfo

        public void updateUploadFileInfo(VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo fileInfo)
                          throws VDiskException
        更新数据库中的文件分段信息。 通过重写此方法，可以自定义本地文件分段信息的存储方式。 Update file segment information in database. Override this method to user-define a storage mode for segment information.
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • deleteUploadFileInfo

        public void deleteUploadFileInfo(VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo fileInfo)
        删除数据库中的文件分段信息。 通过重写此方法，可以自定义本地文件分段信息的存储方式。 Delete file segment information in database. Override this method to user-define a storage mode for segment information.
        参数:
        fileInfo -

      • makeMD5s

        public String makeMD5s(String srcPath,
              long fileSize,
              long segmentLength)
                throws VDiskException
        计算每一个分段文件的md5，拼接成以逗号分隔的字符串。 Compute md5 of each segment file and append them to a string separated by ",".
        参数:
        srcPath - 本地文件路径 Path of local file
        fileSize - 本地文件长度 Size of local file
        segmentLength - 每段文件的长度 Length of each file segment
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

        public void abort()
        中断上传行为 Interrupt the uploading.
